title: True Crime - Streets of LA
description:
True Crime - Streets of LA

Los Angeles, CA. Stretching does not tens of kilometers
Glorious City of Angels - a metropolis, full of everything
that can imagine people. The city of joy, and three hundred
days of sunshine a year, the city of the warm sea, white sand,
green palm trees, blue sky and beautiful tanned girls. A city
in which every minute of five doses of heroin for sale,
in which every few seconds a crime, the city in which you
can kill for three dollars and a half a bottle of whiskey,
which drove out of ignorance in the wrong area of â€‹â€‹the tourists
are afraid to stop at traffic lights, and those who stayed in -
very later regret their decision. City, different, like no other
on this planet. Welcome. You now live here.

True Crime. Streets of LA - a new 3D action, in which you will
play the role of Nick Kang - a former cop who has returned to
the service at the request of the chief of the local police.
The purpose of the young man, full of ambition, and prone to
non-standard (for the police) methods of investigation - to
end the outrage of several street gangs and find his father.
You will find numerous car chases, bloody shootouts, brutal
melee and aching heart a sense of freedom to tens of square
kilometers in detail the simulated streets of Los Angeles.
In this paper, the game was attended by a lot of iconic
hip-hop groups in True Crime. Streets of LA features 50
original compositions such idols of youth, as Snoop Dogg,
Westside Connection, Coolio, Damizza, Suga Free,
Warren G. and others.

System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : 1.5 GHz
Memory : 128 MB
Video : 32 MB
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9
Free space on hard disk : 3.5 GB
